# css-system-font-keywords

List of CSS system font keywords:
- caption
- icon
- menu
- message-box
- small-caption
- status-bar

## Installation

```
npm install css-system-font-keywords [--save[-dev]]
```

## Usage

```js
var systemFontKeywords = require('css-system-font-keywords');
systemFontKeywords; /*
[
	"caption",
	"icon",
	"menu",
	"message-box",
	"small-caption",
	"status-bar"
]
*/
```
